Title: Prohibits public officials from using, or soliciting or permitting the use of the likeness of a candidate or a family member in publicly funded disseminations of material or information
Summary: Prohibits public officials from using, or soliciting or permitting the use of, the name, voice, picture or other likeness of a candidate or a family member in publicly funded disseminations of material or information.
LawCode: Add ยง73-c, Pub Off L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public officers law, in relation to prohibiting public officials from using, or soliciting or permitting the use of, the name, voice, picture or other likeness of a candidate or a member of a candidate's family in publicly funded disseminations of material or information
